msbt.message: It's real fun to talk to you so much. But my brain is tired and wants to think about snacking, not talking. So I'm gonna go do that. Let's talk later, OK?
Hmm I'm thinkingwith my mindright now.Let's play later OK?
Oh Oh yeah! I just remembered something!I need some alone time to think about what I just remembered. So let's talk later, !
